markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 89 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** L **Activate**Interact --- Each draft of _faerie dragon liqueur_ has a different flavor. For 1 hour after you drink it, you can use a single action to breathe out a 15-foot cone of euphoric gas. Each creature in the cone must attempt a DC 23 Will save. After you use this breath weapon, you can't do so again for 1d4 rounds. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round.
**Failure** The creature is stupefied 1 for 1 minute and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1d4 rounds.
**Critical Failure** The creature is stupefied 2 and slowed 1 for 1 minute. Faerie Dragon Liqueur (Young) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 89 1.1 **Price** 70 gp **Bulk** L Faerie Dragon Liqueur (Adult) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 89 1.1 **Price** 400 gp **Bulk** L --- The save DC is 29. Faerie Dragon Liqueur (Wyrm) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 89 1.1 **Price** 3,000 gp **Bulk** L --- The save DC is 37.
name: Faerie Dragon Liqueur (Adult)
